articles.title: USD Coin value falls after revealing $3.3bn held at Silicon Valley Bank - The Guardian
articles.description: The stablecoin fell as low as $0.87 as Circle broke the news that its reserves were at the collapsed lender

articles.author: Joshua Franklin, Stephen Gandel
articles.title: Cheap deposits have become a painful pandemic hangover for US banks - Financial Times
articles.description: Rising rates have slashed the value of bonds that lenders such as Silicon Valley Bank bought with customer money
articles.content:
The failure of Silicon Valley Bank and the sell-off in US banks that followed have highlighted the lasting dangers of a strategy many lenders used to boost profits when interest rates were low.
